issue.title: [CF 1419] Soul Shard Fragments
issue.body:
Since 7.2.5, Destruction warlocks' resource (the soul shard) is now split into fragments.  It would be convenient to have tracking and conditions available for soul shards as fragments rather than as just whole shards.  Currently, custom LUA can do this (UnitPower("player",7,true)/UnitPowerDisplayMod(7)) will give that info, but 1) that's a little cumbersome and 2) there's no real way to translate that into a Resource Display bar.


> Posted by CurseForge user canofbutter | Imported from CurseForge issue #1419 | Raw
